attributes.action: A professional career in lip syncing songs as an artist should become a thing.
attributes.additional_details: Lip syncing to songs has and always will be a fun thing to do. Some people may not be able to sing but have a very strong passion for performing on stage therefore, lip syncing would be the perfect opportunity for someone to perform on stage along with their dance and acting skills.
attributes.background: A TV show should be created (like Britains Got Talent) where an individual or group compete against others in a lip syncing contest. Not only would be great for those taking part but it is also perfect entertainment for people at home. From this show à carrer could be developed.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for commissioning new TV shows, which would be a decision for production companies and broadcasters.
